fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Turn the tables on a player each night. If they're a role that grants a form of direct protection, they will instead hit their target(s) with an attack. The attack tier is equivalent to whatever defense they *would* have given. If there was no specified Defense value, it deals a Basic attack.
- Use your silver tongue on a player. Their visit tonight will roleblock the target instead of it's original purpose. (3 uses)
- Create a private chat with a target of your choice. You'll be known as the Swashbuckler. Using your second ability on your target will now deal a Basic attack in addition to the roleblock. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Any targets killed by your abilities are **cleaned**, and you'll learn their true roles and wills.
- You may multitask.
